mapper.select: select p.*, pa.par_regid from fit_program p inner join fit_partner pa on p.pro_parid = pa.par_id where pa.par_regid = #{regId}

select pr.pro_name, pr.pro_id, pr.pro_photo, pr.pro_desc, pr.pro_since, pr.pro_period, pr.pro_price, pr.pro_catid, pr.pro_people, pr.pro_maxpeople, pr.pro_sale3, pa.par_regid from fit_program pr inner join fit_partner pa on pr.pro_parid = pa.par_id where pr.pro_state = 'Y'

select pr.pro_name, pr.pro_id, pr.pro_photo, pr.pro_desc, pr.pro_since, pr.pro_period, pr.pro_price, pr.pro_sale2, pr.pro_sale3, pr.pro_people, pr.pro_maxpeople, c.cat_name, reg.reg_name, pa.par_name, i.ins_name, r.rev_score, r.rev_content, r.rev_writer, r.rev_date from fit_program pr inner join fit_partner pa on pr.pro_parid = pa.par_id inner join fit_instructor i on i.ins_id = pr.pro_insid left outer join fit_review r on r.rev_proid = pr.pro_id inner join fit_category c on c.cat_id = pr.pro_catid inner join (select pt.par_id, re.reg_name from fit_region re inner join fit_partner pt on re.reg_id = pt.par_regid) reg on reg.par_id = pr.pro_parid where pr.pro_state = 'Y' and pr.pro_id = #{proId}
mapper.update: update fit_program set pro_id = #{pro_oriid}, pro_state = 'Y', pro_oriid = null where pro_id = #{pro_id}

update.if: update fit_program set pro_people = pro_people + 1 where pro_id = #{proId}
